description: Black cohosh (Actaea racemosa) is an amazing species, native to North America with many remarkable qualities. The deep and intricate root system of black cohosh is highly valued for medicinal purposes, most notably its ability to help aid and regulate a woman’s menstrual cycle. Additionally, scientific studies indicate that black cohosh’s anti-inflammatory, antispasmodic, analgesic, and anti-oxidant characteristics may be helpful in alleviating muscular and joint pain. The perennial herb grows up to two feet tall producing stunning white flowers and is often found growing in shaded areas. Overall, black cohoes is an amazing species praised for its medicinal uses and prized for its beauty.
